Description: CI/CD Pipeline for Web Application Deployment using CodePipeline, CodeBuild, and CodeDeploy

NotificationEmail.Description: Email address to receive pipeline notifications

ArtifactBucketName.Description: Name of the S3 bucket to store pipeline artifacts

ApplicationName.Description: Name of the application to be deployed

CreateCodeCommitRepo.Description: Whether to create a CodeCommit repository (set to false if CodeCommit is not available)

Source.BuildSpec:
version: 0.2
phases:
  install:
    runtime-versions:
      nodejs: 14
    commands:
      - echo Installing dependencies...
      - npm install
  build:
    commands:
      - echo Build started on `date`
      - npm run build
  post_build:
    commands:
      - echo Build completed on `date`
      - echo Preparing deployment package...
      - mkdir -p dist/scripts
      - cp -r scripts dist/
      - cp appspec.yml dist/
artifacts:
  files:
    - appspec.yml
    - 'scripts/**/*'
    - 'dist/**/*'
    - 'public/**/*'
    - package.json
    - package-lock.json
  discard-paths: no
cache:
  paths:
    - 'node_modules/**/*'

version: 0.2
phases:
  install:
    runtime-versions:
      nodejs: 14
    commands:
      - echo Installing dependencies...
      - npm install
  pre_build:
    commands:
      - echo Running linting...
      - npm run lint
  build:
    commands:
      - echo Running tests...
      - npm test
  post_build:
    commands:
      - echo Testing completed on `date`
      - echo Generating test reports...
reports:
  test-reports:
    files:
      - 'test-reports/**/*'
    base-directory: './'
artifacts:
  files:
    - 'test-reports/**/*'
  discard-paths: no

AlarmDescription.Fn::Sub: Alarm for deployment errors in the ${DevEnvironmentName} environment
Alarm for deployment errors in the ${ProdEnvironmentName} environment

Properties.Description: Rule for capturing CodePipeline state changes

CodeCommitRepositoryCloneUrlHTTPS.Description: HTTPS URL for cloning the CodeCommit repository

CodeCommitRepositoryCloneUrlSSH.Description: SSH URL for cloning the CodeCommit repository

PipelineConsoleURL.Description: Console URL for the CI/CD Pipeline

NotificationTopicARN.Description: ARN of the SNS Topic used for pipeline notifications
